    Sponsor NSCamp

    Costs for food, beverages and possibly internet can mount up, so we're offering sponsorship opportunities for NSCamp. This is so we can keep the cost of attending NSCamp at a reasonable level.

    If your business is interested in reaching out to an elite group of iOS and OSX developers, download our sponsor package (pdf)
